1.speaker: A
sentence: I ran into my ex-girl friend on the street yesterday.
나 우연히 만났어 내 이전 여자친구를 길에서.

2.speaker: B
sentence: Wow. Don't tell me you chickened out.
와우. 설마 아니지 너 겁먹고 도망치지?

3.speaker: A
sentence: I almost sprained my ankle while stepped backwards.
나 거의 발목을 삐끗할 뻔했어 도중에 뒷걸음 치다.

4.speaker: B
sentence: You should take your mind off her.
너 해야되 너의 마음에서 그녀를 떨쳐버려야.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Yeah. I think it's time to pull myself together.
응. 내 생각에 할 시간이야 내 마음을 잡을(정신차릴)

6.speaker: B
sentence: Don't worry. I think you can manage.
걱정마. 너는 잘 할 수 있을 꺼야.
